attributes.contentHtml:
I don't normally write on this site but this was just too much and I just had to share it with you guys. This is a WHOLE OTHER LEVEL of stupidity.

Apparently, I found out that badsk lives on a boat, and he recently said he was planning on buying servers and homeboat-hosting them. He gets his internet from mobile fucking data, so the servers would be connected via mobile data, and would be in the middle of the fucking ocean on his boat. There is a ridiculously high number of problems with this, and I just thought it this was hilarious.

I don't know how this guy thinks that this is such a brilliant idea, honestly this guy's stupidity is at such a high level that I don't think anyone in the present, future, or the history of humanity will ever understand his line of thinking.

attributes.title: ViaHost, Sryden, ExoHost, AltHost, HelioNodes, BlockNode | Bad/Layer

attributes.contentHtml: Hye if humans could sell their stupidity for money, badsk would be rich by now
